# My OwO Dotfiles

Just my fluffy Void Linux configuration!



## What is in it?
- Fish
- HerbstluftWM
- Dunst
- Eww
- Alacritty
- Brave Browser
- Procastination

## F.A.Q

### How do I install your dotfiles?
> Run: `./th apply`

### I don't like it. How do I uninstall?
> Run: `./th remove`
